reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, comfortable, and flattering, with positive feedback about its quality, material, and stretchiness.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and sexy
items.body: Perfect for a couples Valentine party. Comfortable, sexy and classy. Was able to find hubby the same velvet color blazer. So hot ðŸ”¥! We even won the couples challenge, great night, perfect outfit. We had chucks (converse) on our feet!! All comfort Read more
items.author: LuMa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits like a glove!!
items.body: She fits like a glove!! High neck with 3 button closure are the top, makes the neckline feel very secure for the open back. Comfortable and flattering in all the right places with the gathered detail. Not see through at all, great velvet quality! I got my true size small, 5â€™6â€ 129lbs Read more
items.author: Reilly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The Open Back is Stunning!
items.body: Orignally ordered this in small and decided to return for the XS. It does seem to run a little large. For reference I am 5'1", around 125lbs (muscular/athletic build) and 34A. The XS fits well although could be a smidge smaller in the sides as other reviews indicate. Giving 4/5 stars because of two reasons: A) the fit and B) it came smelling strongly like body odor, like someone had already worn it for a night out and returned it. Nothing a little wash can't fit (hopefully). Read more
items.author: Kristen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this dress!
items.body: It was between this dress and another and I really wanted to keep this one because I absolutely loved it but couldn't because it is not pumping-friendly. I had to pump three times during the event I went to and it would have been a pain. However, will purchase this dress down the road because I just love it. Very flattering, soft, and the cutest low cut-back. I am 5'3 and about 130 pounds. Those with smaller chest area, may be a bit big there. The small fit great below the chest and the XS fir great in the chest but little tight lower down. Might be worth adding cups to it! Read more
items.author: Mariah Colly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely perfect
items.body: I needed a dress for a gala. After searching for months, I got desperate and ordered this one. BEST DRESS EVER. so comfortable and affordable!! I got so many compliments. It runs a little big, I ordered a small and had to have it altered to fit but it was worth it. Such a classy, pretty dress. I hope there is another occasion for me to wear it. Read more
items.author: Kim

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fits big
items.body: I wanted to love this dressâ€”itâ€™s absolutely beautiful! Unfortunately, I ran into a few issues. One of the buttons on the neck area didnâ€™t have a loop, which made it difficult to close properly. Also, it runs big; I ordered a size small, and even though my measurements are 36â€ bust, 27â€ waist, and 42â€ hips, the back fit too loosely for me. Other than that, itâ€™s such a lovely piece. I wish I could have kept it! Read more
items.author: Soledad Martinez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress but the back gaped on me
items.body: I like the material, stretch, and color of the dress. Unfortunately I'll be returning because the back gaped significantly on the sides even when I was standing up straight. Read more
items.author: Dev

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
items.body: Disappointed in the quality for the price. Very thin material with no lining, oddly stitched so the sides stuck out, and the fasteners are poorly attached. The sizing and color were correct, and I liked the slit. I will be returning. Read more
items.author: Rachel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Maxi Cocktail Bodycon Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Maxi Cocktail Bodycon Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Maxi Cocktail Bodycon Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Red, Wine Red, Purple, Apricot Pink, Olive Green, Peacock Blue, Royal Blue, Leopard, Black, Coffee, Denim Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
